text: Ezɨ God, Krais ko porogha en faragha zuima, e an gɨn ghua kalabuziar gumazibar mɨn ghua bar akuegha mɨgɨa ghaze, Krais modorozim gafiragha apaniba dɨkabɨragha gɨfa! Ezɨ arazir kamɨn gumazamiziba bar God gɨfoghamin fofozim ini. A mati mughuriar aghuimɨn mɨn otozɨ, amɨnim a bɨrazɨ a tintinibar ghu. Bizir kam bagha kɨ Godɨn mɨnabi.(2:14) Grighɨn akar otevitam kagh deragha mɨkemezir puvatɨ.
